Flaxmere community calls out anti-social behaviour around housing development https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/flaxmere-community-calls-out-anti-social-behaviour-around-housing-development/R3OY7VPRMBEOZN2BYTVNG3S2NQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/flaxmere-community-calls-out-anti-social-behaviour-around-housing-development/R3OY7VPRMBEOZN2BYTVNG3S2NQ/ Community members gathered to discuss unsafe driving, theft, and illegal dumping on marae. Thu, 01 Aug 2024 22:00:00 +0000 A group of Waingākau residents, kura staff, Te Aranga Marae Trustees, City Assist ambassadors, Flaxmere Community Patrol members, Hastings District Council staff and police met to discuss anti-social behaviour. Photo / Te Taiwhenua o Heretaunga
